ISSUE.TITLE: Make configurable whether customers are allowed to remove their external authentication record(s)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Right now customers have the options to remove their external authentication record (public store). Let's add a setting indicating whether it's allowed. Name: "ExternalAuthenticationSettings.AllowCustomersToRemoveAssociations" (enabled by default). Also add it to the customer settings page (with "Auto register" setting) Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/46601/login-logic-problem.aspx

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #157 Performance optimization. Cache currencies (do not load them for each HTTP request).

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #2226 Added a setting to allow customers to remove their external authentication associations
